info.name: Tumblr- Cat Dashboard Icons
info.description:
just some little cat doodles for the text/photo/quote/etc. section (made by me.)

private use only please!
info.additionalInfo: mar 24, 2012 - v2 - fixed after tumblr's icon revamp. these should override the new images now. THESE DO NOT HAVE TEXT. if you'd like a version with text, go here! apr 17, 2012 - hey these are broken right now because tumblr decided to change some stupid thing again and I haven't figured it out yet. sorry about that. I'll get to it. may 28, 2012 - fixed again! :)
